alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:04AM EST until January 22 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central, northwest and western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest ice accumulations will be on the ridges above 1500 feet elevation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
